About CityKey

We help hotels facilitate better travel experiences for guests.

The CityKey Philosophy

There are few things in life that almost all people share in common, yet a desire and love of travel is nearly ubiquitous across cultures. We believe hotels serve as a symbol for the humanity of travel, for hospitality. Our mission is to do everything in our power to make travel easier, better, and more enjoyable for hotel guests.

  • Museums

Why do we do it?

People save their hard earned money and time-off to take sacred reprieves from their daily routines as they search for meaning through travel. They revel in joy as they experience new sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and cultures as they share them with friends - new and old alike. Travel makes us happier, more interesting, and more tolerant people and we believe that is precious and know that hoteliers do to. And thatâ€™s why we built CityKey, because travel is precious.
